channel.title: The DataSec Outpost
channel.description: Recent content on The DataSec Outpost

item.title: Hello World, This is DataSec Outpost.
This site is not ready yet.
item.description: Thanks to pacollins for the amazing template: hugo-future-imperfect-slim Still testing the platform, in the meanwhile many links are broken. I’ll fix that very soon.

item.title: About
item.description: This site focuses on data security related content (open source preferred) such as NAS, Self-hosted cloud storage, data loss prevention solutions and ransomware recover. Thanks for the Hugo template made by pacollins. https://github.com/pacollins/hugo-future-imperfect-slim Thanks for Hugo which made this site possible.

item.title: Markdown Syntax Guide
item.description: This article offers a sample of basic Markdown syntax that can be used in Hugo content files, also it shows whether basic HTML elements are decorated with CSS in a Hugo theme.

item.title: Rich Content
item.description: Hugo ships with several Built-in Shortcodes for rich content, along with a Privacy Config and a set of Simple Shortcodes that enable static and no-JS versions of various social media embeds.

item.title: Emoji Support
item.description: Emoji can be enabled in a Hugo project in a number of ways.
